title: Olga Holtz
summary: Olga Holtz (Russian: Ольга Гольц; born August 19, 1973) is a Russian mathematician specializing in numerical analysis. She received the Sofia Kovalevskaya Award in 2006[1] and the European Mathematical Society Prize (2008).  Since 2008, she is a member of the Young Academy (Junge Akademie[2]) of Germany.
